original_title: Blue Blood Tour Bakuhatsu Sunzen Gig
overview: Blue Blood Tour Bakuhatsu Sunzen Gig is a live VHS/LD released by X Japan on June 1, 1989. It contains footage from the band's performance at "Shibuya Koukaido" on March 16, 1989. The video was re-released on DVD on September 9, 2001.
title: Blue Blood Tour Bakuhatsu Sunzen Gig
